title: Overflowing garbage on Road 21
description: Garbage has not been collected for 5 days, causing bad odor and inconvenience.

title: Broken water pipeline in front of school
description: A water pipe burst has flooded the road in front of a local school.

title: Blocked drainage near market area
description: The drain near the bazar is clogged with waste and emits foul smell.

title: Tree plantation required in park
description: The park area has lost most of its trees and needs new plantation.

title: Plastic waste around lake area
description: Plastic bottles and wrappers are scattered around the lakeside.

title: Streetlight not working for a week
description: Multiple streetlights are broken, causing safety concerns at night.

title: Sewage water on roadside
description: Sewage water is leaking and creating health hazards in the area.

title: Illegal dumping in open field
description: People are dumping garbage openly near the residential area.

title: Need trees beside playground
description: The playground area lacks shade; tree plantation would help reduce heat.

title: Overflowing dustbins near hospital
description: Dustbins are not being cleared regularly, posing a health risk.

title: Water logging after rain
description: Even light rain causes waterlogging due to poor drainage.

title: Overflowing drain causing mosquito issues
description: Drain overflowing for days, causing bad smell and mosquito infestation.
